item.description:
Join Trailblazers for a Seacoast Tradition!  Come celebrate the holiday season with a night full of warmth, intimacy and good cheer as we watch "A Christmas Carol".  This play celebrates it’s 21st year at The Players’ Ring.

Please note the date and time change.  We are now attending the Sunday, December 16 performance which begins an hour earlier than previously planned.  We will meet at the Players Ring at 6:30, after the show we will walk over to the "Press Room" for some more "holiday cheer"  or possibly to the State Street Saloon or The Page to watch the rest of the Patriots game!

Make your own reservations for the show at: 603-436-8123.  The show could sell out, so don't wait!

Hope to see you there for a traditional Christmas show!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Charles Dickens’ A Christmas Carol
